misc: Has planted his seeds in four different women in four different decades.
biography: Mikko is a renowned golfer from Lakeside Golf Vammala, with a consistent presence at the prestigious Hector Trophée.  His dedication to the game is evident in his multiple appearances in the tournament, having competed in each edition since 2022.

While Mikko hasn't yet secured a victory in the Hector Trophée, his persistent participation demonstrates a commitment to excellence and a strong competitive spirit.  He’s a player to watch; someone who’s clearly worked hard on his game.

Beyond his competitive achievements, Mikko is known for his unique and engaging personality.  His vibrant spirit and charm shine through both on and off the course, adding an extra layer of excitement to the tournament each year.
He's a man who has certainly made his mark on the world. His contributions both on and off the golf course have made him a compelling presence in the sport. A truly fascinating personality.
